channel.title: Hyperion II - Dialogue API
channel.description:
I've been working on a Dialogue API for my Hyperion-based server, and here is the result of about 20 hours of work: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dx9kS2zSq4E]YouTube - Hyperion II Dialogue API[/url]
The code for the dialogue used in that video (for reference to the ease and efficiency of my API): [url=http://pastebin.com/xcmdvbEh][Java] - Pastebin.com[/url]
